Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>…… セレーナさんは何歳だ？
なんだよ、ヤブから棒に……
Entry.EnglishText: What's got you asking that all of a sudden...?

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか!? 姉貴に気があるんじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: Wait! Don't tell me that you're interested in my sister...?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 違う。さらわれた娘たちに共通点はないか、 考えていただけだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not. I'm just trying to think of what the kidnapped girls have in common.

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴は２１歳だ。クレアさんは？
Entry.EnglishText: My sister is twenty-one. What about Claire?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアは１７歳になったばかりだ…… 年齢で選ばれたわけじゃないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: She'd just turned seventeen... So it seems like they don't choose them based on age...
